title: Wide Awake. Every Day.
description: "Wide Awake. Every Day." offers 365 short readings that will turn your awareness into a loyal and creative friend, every day of the year. Each page serves up a delectable vignette of insight and interest from the author's keen and loving observations. Gentle, do-able action steps end each reading and bring the day's inspiration into enlightening focus. Summary quotes are at hand with on-the-go food for thought. King's remarkable insights are informed by secular and spiritual practices, both Eastern and Western, making her ideas resonate with readers from all walks of life. Religious? No. Spiritual? Yes. You'll find yourself here - in a whole new way.
author: Starla J. King
